landscapemetrics
  • Reference
  • News

Total Edge (TE, class scale)

Total Edge

lsm_c_te(landscape)

# S3 method for RasterLayer
lsm_c_te(landscape)

# S3 method for RasterStack
lsm_c_te(landscape)

# S3 method for RasterBrick
lsm_c_te(landscape)

# S3 method for list
lsm_c_te(landscape)

Arguments

landscape

Raster* Layer, Stack, Brick or a list of rasterLayers.

Value

tibble

References

McGarigal, K., and B. J. Marks. 1995. FRAGSTATS: spatial pattern analysis program for quantifying landscape structure. USDA For. Serv. Gen. Tech. Rep. PNW-351.

Examples

lsm_c_te(landscape)
#> # A tibble: 3 x 5
#>   layer level    id metric                  value
#>   <int> <chr> <int> <chr>                   <dbl>
#> 1     1 class     1 percentage of landscape   90 
#> 2     1 class     2 percentage of landscape  114.
#> 3     1 class     3 percentage of landscape  160.
lsm_c_te(landscape_stack)
#> # A tibble: 15 x 5
#>    layer level    id metric                  value
#>    <int> <chr> <int> <chr>                   <dbl>
#>  1     1 class     1 percentage of landscape 104. 
#>  2     1 class     2 percentage of landscape 133  
#>  3     1 class     3 percentage of landscape 132. 
#>  4     2 class     1 percentage of landscape 132  
#>  5     2 class     2 percentage of landscape 132. 
#>  6     2 class     3 percentage of landscape 164. 
#>  7     3 class     1 percentage of landscape  92  
#>  8     3 class     2 percentage of landscape 114. 
#>  9     3 class     3 percentage of landscape 134. 
#> 10     4 class     1 percentage of landscape 120  
#> 11     4 class     2 percentage of landscape 110  
#> 12     4 class     3 percentage of landscape 146  
#> 13     5 class     1 percentage of landscape  72  
#> 14     5 class     2 percentage of landscape  89.5
#> 15     5 class     3 percentage of landscape 118.
